name: Wildbus
detailed_description:
Game introduction
This is an ARPG game that searching for the native land of light.The player operates a modified armed bus, walks through the desperate Orakos, fights with mutant monsters and robbers, across all kinds of difficulties, just want to find the native land of light that is full of happiness...
Background story
The big destruction is a war that lasted for more than 10 years between a large enterprise and the government. When the war ended, Orakos was enveloped in thick clouds and could not see sunshine all the year round.Mutate monsters and robbers go under the haze, and those who believe in light are still look for the native land of light that is full of happiness in the desperate war ruins wilderness...
Game features
● Collect different weapons for combined attacks!
● The key to the Raiders is to get the props!
● Invite passengers to get on the bus to get special abilities!
● Accidents, ruins, enemies... Going forward to the hometown of light across all kinds of difficulties!
